postGenerationPrompts.prompt: Write a paragraph of description for the image. Include atmosphere, lighting, color, mood, and any other imagined details relevant to the scene such as sound and smell. If the image is focused on a single character, include all of the following items for that character: species and race, gender, age, facial features and expressions, occupation, hair and hair accessories (if any), what they are wearing on their body. Include only descriptions of visual qualities and anything which could seen in a still photograph. Ignore qualities such as personality, scents, and other non-visual traits. Be concise. Only include the description, do not include any other text. The description is:

Write only one short name that would be a highly descriptive but concise summary for the image. If the image is focusing on a single character, imagine a name that fits the character's appearance instead. The name must be three words or less, and must not include any special characters or punctuation. The name must be in title case. The image description is: [description]
